title: Can't really describe typography well. It's pretty simple
content:
Somebody made this logo a couple of years ago. Nobody has the raw file and I can't find anybody who can ID the font. Your help please.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021045811im_/http:/typophile.com/files/download_5433.jpg)
author: Sithe

comments.content: It must be **[For the love of hate (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021045811/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=For%20the%20love%20of%20hate%20light%20-%20Light&fid=671c8e17211285f6e89209f3d1f06b04&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=BongoHive&wrap=2)** by Rory Minchin-King (1998, Free for personal use) probably a bit emboldened
